page.text: L e e S t a n d e r f e r
L e e S t a n d e r f e r
22809 E Country Vista Drive 106  Liberty Lake, WA 99019  Phone: (208) 791-8490
DARDEN RESTAURANTS RED LOBSTER – Spokane, WA
Certified Grill Master, 07/2002-07/2004, 5/2009-Present
Leads team of co-workers in the kitchen to successfully insure quality product and customer service.
Operates as head of the kitchen to the front of the restaurant and managerial staff.
EASTERN WASHINGTON UNIVERSITY – Cheney, WA
Athletic Department Intern, 09/2009 to 12/2009
Assisted in the complete setup of broadcasting and recording sporting events at the NCAA level. Traveled
with teams to provide technical and media support, promotion of sponsors, directed planned events, and
half-time shows. Directly responsible for public promotional items during athletic events.
EASTERN WASHINGTON UNIVERSITY – Cheney, WA
Assistant to the Director of Athletic Media, 09/2007-06/2009
Conducted NCAA videotaping of all university athletic coverage and major events. Responsible in the
proper setup of media tri-casting center. Provided live feed coverage and proper inventory of the all
equipment. Shoot ground and press box coverage for Comcast on demand and live Internet broadband
streaming for The Big Sky Conference. Produced highlight videos for teams.
THE DAVENPORT HOTEL – Spokane, WA
Marketing Researcher, 03/2009-06/2009
Partnered with Eastern Washington University and the Davenport hotel management team to conduct
marketing research of the fine dining experience at the hotel. Conducted survey and market research for
Davenport management.
Attended formal meetings, lectures, and supported fundraising events.
EASTERN WASHINGTON UNIVERSITY – Cheney, WA

text.b: Bachelor of Arts in Business Administration,
